title: Hugo Install Documentation
content: Hugo    Go                                                  Hugo          hugo  hugo exe                   Hugo                Hugo  watch                                                         Hugo   Go          nice    Hugo                                                                                                                                              hugo                                  Github pages S3 Azure CloudFront                                 Github Pages                   nice     hugo       hugo  Github                hugo hugo exe          0 48                             hugo           D  Hugo bin hugo help     hugo main command  used build Hugo site      Hugo Fast Flexible Static Site Generator built love spf13 friends Go      Complete documentation available http   gohugo io       Usage    hugo  flags  hugo  command      Available Commands    benchmark Benchmark Hugo building site number times  config Print site configuration convert Convert content different formats env Print Hugo version environment info gen collection several useful generators  help Help command import Import site others  list Listing various types content new Create new content site server high performance webserver version Print version number Hugo     Flags     b    baseURL string hostname  and path  root  e g  http   spf13 com   D    buildDrafts include content marked draft  E    buildExpired include expired content  F    buildFuture include content publishdate future   cacheDir string filesystem path cache directory  Defaults   TMPDIR hugo_cache    canonifyURLs  deprecated  true  relative URLs will canonicalized using baseURL   cleanDestinationDir remove files destination not found static directories   config string config file  default path config yaml json toml   c    contentDir string filesystem path content directory   debug debug output  d    destination string filesystem path write files   disableKinds strings disable different kind pages  home  RSS etc     enableGitInfo add Git revision  date author info pages   forceSyncStatic copy files when static changed    gc enable run cleanup tasks  remove unused cache files  build  h    help help hugo   i18n warnings print missing translations   ignoreCache ignores cache directory  l    layoutDir string filesystem path layout directory   log enable Logging   logFile string log File path  if set  logging enabled automatically    minify minify supported output format  HTML  XML etc     noChmod don t sync permission mode files   noTimes don t sync modification time files   pluralizeListTitles  deprecated  pluralize titles lists using inflect  default true    preserveTaxonomyNames  deprecated  preserve taxonomy names written   G rard Depardieu  vs  gerard depardieu     quiet build quiet mode   renderToMemory render memory  only useful benchmark testing   s    source string filesystem path read files relative   stepAnalysis display memory timing different steps program   templateMetrics display metrics template executions   templateMetricsHints calculate improvement hints when combined   templateMetrics  t    theme string theme use  located  themes THEMENAME     themesDir string filesystem path themes directory   uglyURLs  deprecated  true  use  filename html instead  filename   v    verbose verbose output   verboseLog verbose logging  w    watch watch filesystem changes recreate needed     Additional help topics    hugo check Contains verification checks     Use hugo  command    help information command     hugo                 github pages
